```{r carga_datos, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

shellcodes <- read_csv("./files_shellcodes.csv")
```


```{r ajustar_tipos_columnas}
# convertir columna platform (actualmente character) a factor (la reasigno a la misma columna directamente)
exploits$platform <- as.factor(exploits$platform)
exploits$type <- as.factor(exploits$type)

# rename file column to avoid conflicts
exploits$files <- exploits$file
exploits$file <-  NULL
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r grafico_platform, echo=FALSE}
# mostrar top 10 platforms
exploits_top_platforms <- exploits %>% group_by(platform) %>% summarise(total = n())

#exploits_top_platforms <- arrange(exploits_top_platforms, desc(total))

exploits %>%
group_by(platform) %>%
  count %>% 
  filter(n > 500) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = platform, y = n)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```


Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

```{r graficotype, echo=FALSE}

qplot(exploits$type)
```
